definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: , dub. word;—in [[הָלַךְ]] [[אַחֲרֵי־חָָו]] Ho 5:11 usu. command, ordinance; < LXX SyrVer Che Now GASm [[שָׁוְא]]; elsewh. only [[חַו לָחָ֨ו חַו לָêָחו]] (‖[[קַו לָקָו קָו קַו לָקָו]]), Is 28:10 in mocking mimicry of Is.'s words, and, v:Is 28:13, of the unintelligible speech of ´[[י]]'s foreign agents of judgement; Ges Che:Comm. al. (cf. AV RV) render command upon command; Ew Di (carpenter's) rule (+ [[קַו]] = line and rule), fr. √[[חָוָה]] (whence [[חִיּוּן]]); Du Che:Hpt explain as mocking sounds without sense.
